name: Idle Adventure (itch)
description:
Embark on an adventure to regain your lost, but once powerful, imagination in order to convince your younger brother, that you are still a worthy playmate! Explore the island you live upon, while training your imagination to allow yourself to see the world as your brother sees it!

Now the question is whether or not you are able to imagine an adventure so exciting that it proves once and for all that you are still worth playing with!
